text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a _ActRelationshipPosting

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActRelationshipPostingActRelationshipPostingExpresses values for describing the relationship between a FinancialTransaction and an Account.

name: ActRelationshipPosting
title: ActRelationshipPosting
description: Expresses values for describing the relationship between a FinancialTransaction and an Account.
